title: SAHM Week: Should Moms or Dads Stay Home with Kids?
description:
In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms Week: Audrey was planning to be a stay-at-home-mom with her first baby, but her husband is unemployed and asking her to go back to work. - Dr. Laura: "One loving parent at home with a child is better than none."

Who's home with your young children? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

Order Dr. Laura’s book: “In Praise of Stay-At-Home Moms” go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-in-praise-of-stay-at-home-moms

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
